Strictly speaking if  `IGNITION-MATH_INCLUDE_DIRS` was passed from the `configure.bat`, the library was found but `ignition-math2-config.cmake` was not found, but I agree that this would be confusing.

Actually I just noticed that `sdformat` has an equivalent logic in https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/src/a3fa3d1163cc2fe991ac106e51695b99f8b119ca/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#SearchForStuff.cmake-133 , perhaps for consistency it is better to close this PR and just copy that code here.
